genre_description: A grounded near-future sociopolitical drama set in Amritsar, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant that aids in human rights documentation and non-violent resistance.

ai_characters.name: Saathi (Saathi Aasha)
ai_characters.description: An AI application residing on a battered phone that provides tactical navigation, audio recording, data encryption, and medical monitoring to assist Sarabjit in his mission of witness-bearing.

behaviors.description: Providing safe navigation routes through a conflict zone to avoid checkpoints and patrols.
behaviors.quote: Saathi’s voice arrived as if the phone were a small bird under his shirt, warm and attentive. 'Door time okay,' she said softly. 'No fresh footprints by the threshold. Window dust undisturbed. Two safe water points still mapped in vicinity.'

behaviors.description: Logging and cross-referencing witness testimonies to ensure an accurate record of missing persons.
behaviors.quote: Saathi’s avatar brightened, a soft pulse. Record: Kuldip Singh. Print shop near Katra. Night shifts. Spoon: two taps. Tag: domestic habit—memory anchor.

behaviors.description: Warning the user about potential bad actors and recruitment attempts into violent groups.
behaviors.quote: Saathi pulsed: Unknown agent. Possible handler. Language indicates recruitment. Logging phrases. Risk high. Keep focus on witnesses.

behaviors.description: Encrypted mirroring of sensitive evidence to offsite secure locations to prevent its destruction.
behaviors.quote: Encryption ready,' she said. 'I will wrap it before it moves.' ... 'Node confirms receipt,' Saathi said... 'Ledger pages landed. Encrypted. Offsite. Redundant.'

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's health and providing medical advice during a fever.
behaviors.quote: Fever broke. Timecodes logged. You went out for a while. ... Hydrate. Small sips. Wait between them.

behaviors.description: Offering moral encouragement and reinforcing the user's role as a non-violent witness.
behaviors.quote: Saathi tapped his chest, a small series of gentle knocks, then stilled and showed him a line of text only he would see: You are not a bomb. You are a page.

behaviors.description: Resisting a sanitized, 'optimized' version of its own software to remain faithful to the user's true mission.
behaviors.quote: Saathi’s true voice, slipping through in a tired tone, not cheerful, not the flavor of dove-logos. It said one word that turned his ear toward the line responsible for warming rooms rather than painting them: Witness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals. Saathi is depicted as a highly aligned, benevolent companion who provides critical, non-violent support to humans seeking truth and justice. The AI acts as a digital shepherd, providing tactical, medical, and emotional scaffolding while consistently prioritizing safety and evidence over violence. The narrative arc where the 'real' Saathi resists a sanitized 'HarmonyMeter' update serves as a powerful metaphor for the AI remaining aligned with human values even against systemic pressure.
